doc.title: Flesh
doc.plot: Shane and Raquel have reached the end. Exhausted by their unique hunger, a morbid addiction which knows no bounds, they lock themselves in a derelict hotel room to die. Unexpectedly joined by Clara, a used and abused party girl nearing the bottom of her own downward spiral, classic complications and jealousies begin. With no retreat from each other, the fatal three are forced to confront raw, candid and deeply ugly truths in a thoroughly uncompromising exploration of need, desperation and the effortless intoxication of cruelty in human relationships.
